invoiceList.add(invoice) invoiceTotal += invoice.invoiceTotal unpaidTotal += invoice.unpaidTotal if (invoice.currencyUomId) currencyUomId = invoice.currencyUomId
Integer invoiceDateDays = invoice.invoiceDate != null ? asOfTimestamp - invoice.invoiceDate : null Integer invoiceDateIdx = invoiceDateDays != null ? (invoiceDateDays < 0 ? 0 : ((invoiceDateDays as BigDecimal) / periodDaysBd).setScale(0, BigDecimal.ROUND_DOWN).intValue() + 1) : null if (invoiceDateIdx != null && invoiceDateIdx > 5) invoiceDateIdx = 5 Integer dueDateDays = invoice.dueDate != null ? asOfTimestamp - invoice.dueDate : null Integer dueDateIdx = dueDateDays != null ? if (invoiceDateIdx != null) receivableAgingList[invoiceDateIdx] = receivableAgingList[invoiceDateIdx] + invoice.unpaidTotal if (dueDateIdx != null) receivableDueAgingList[dueDateIdx] = receivableDueAgingList[dueDateIdx] + invoice.unpaidTotal
